draftSaveMessage: Your record has been saved as a draft
closeWithoutSaving: Your record has been closed without saving.
publishRequested: Record saved. A publishing request has been sent to your country's Publishing Authority.
recordPublished: Record published. The record will be now publicly accessible on the ORT.
areYouSure: Are you sure you want to exit this page without saving?
introInfo: This section will have a brief description to help users submit information
confirmLeave: Do you really want to leave? you have unsaved changes!
confirmationMessage: Are you sure you want to proceed with publishing this record?
successfulMessage: Your request to publish has been received.
successMessageNau: Your request to publish will be sent to your country's NFP who has rights to publish.
successMessagePA: The publishing process will take a few minutes to complete and for the content to appear in the search results.
collaboratorsMessage: Other users are currently editing this record. This may result in potential overwrites.
overwriteConfirmationMessage: The record on the server has changed, saving your version will overwrite those changes, are you sure you want to overwrite?
overwriteConfirmationLinkMessage: Click on the link to view the update draft record
